comments.body:
```suggestion
let Gauge: React.ReactElement = <GaugeChart id="gauge-chart1" />;
Gauge = <GaugeChart />;
```
let's have both, for readme-driven-development tests, OK?

Also in our PR to correct props types in package, there is no change for `id` described as `required`,
https://github.com/Martin36/react-gauge-chart/pull/61/files#diff-b335630551682c19a781afebcf4d07bf978fb1f8ac04c6bf87428ed5106870f5L101
what's the status of `id`?
For the readme-driven-development, it's required and you should modify your props.
thx!

According to [PR](https://github.com/Martin36/react-gauge-chart/pull/37) the id is optional.

Will open a PR to update the docs.
Thanks!
